I donated them to good will.

I needed nice khaki pants for work.  I didn't want to go for any brand other than dickies.  Quality is ok. I've worn them a couple of weeks.  So far, they've held up.  I walk and move around alot for my job.  I've been able to move comfortably for a full 8 to 10 hours.  I'm usually a size 2, but these pants fit a little loose. I probably could use a belt, but its fine for now.  I don't like the front part. Makes me look like I have a little fupa. Doesn't matter though,  purchased them for comfort. I am 5'2 and a couple inches too long. With my boots they are fine, I don't need to hem them.  The pants wash well.  I wash them in cold water and throw in the dryer. I don't need to iron really.  They don't get wrinkly too much.  There are only the 2 pockets up front and the 2 back pockets.  Back pocket fits my phone.

These dickies have always been the best and still are the best!! Work in high volume kitchen and these pants hold up very well. They are completely wrinkle free no need to iron, color lasts through many washes.  They fit as expected, but for me the legs are a bit baggy. I believe these will fit a curvy body best.

评论概述: Fades and wears out VERY quickly
评论详情: I remember these being much better quality 20 years ago - which was when I last owned a pair. I needed some nice black pants for work, and while they are very comfortable and look nice for about a week or two, the dye faded extremely fast. I started wearing them in January, it is now March, and I need them for another month. By the end of next month, I'm throwing them out because they just look worn out and old. Also, I was shocked by the fact that there is a wear-whole on the back of them! In an unusual spot as well, not in a place they would be rubbed. It's just cheap material. How disappointing. Also, they are impossible to keep wrinkle free - this was another thing I don't remember from the last time I owned them. You can iron them, but right after you put them on, wrinkled. I bought a pair in Navy blue as well, and I suppose because they're blue they will last longer, but the black isn't made to last anymore, which is a shame.
This pair of pants runs very small!! Please size up. I bought another pair, bigger size & different style. Those fit perfect!
